title: Day That Lehman Died, The - Radio Drama Documentary
description:
1 x 60 Mins

The collapse of the investment bank Lehman Brothers is often cited as the start of the worldwide financial meltdown, the effects of which will continue to be felt for years ahead.

In this fascinating drama documentary, we meet the people behind the crisis, in both the USA and the UK, who desperately tried to find a way to stop Lehman collapsing. Quite riveting listening - more like a thriller than a dry documentary
